AI Code Review Assistant

Intelligent code review platform powered by AI, featuring real-time analysis, automated suggestions, and collaborative workflows for development teams

Full-Stack Developer & AI Engineer February 9, 2024

Project Overview

Technologies Used

  • Next.js
  • React
  • TypeScript
  • Prisma
  • SQLite
  • AWS S3
  • Socket.io
  • Radix UI
ai code-review nextjs typescript aws collaboration

The Challenge

Building an AI-powered code review system that can analyze code quality, security vulnerabilities, and provide intelligent suggestions while handling real-time collaboration for distributed development teams.

The Solution

Developed a full-stack application using Next.js with AI integration through AWS services. Implemented real-time code analysis with Socket.io, created a comprehensive review dashboard with Radix UI components, and built an intelligent suggestion engine that learns from team coding patterns.
